body.name: LEVOIT Air Purifier for Home Bedroom, HEPA Fresheners Filter Small Room Cleaner with Fragrance Sponge for Smoke, Allergies, Pet Dander, Odor, Dust Remover, Office, Desktop, Table Top, 1 Pack, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 53 mins
features: REFRESH YOUR AIR TODAY: Still struggling with allergy symptoms and unwanted odors. Breathe clean air with the effective Levoit LV-H128 Desktop HEPA Air Purifier—perfect for anyone wanting to improve their indoor air quality

3-STAGE DUAL-FILTER DESIGN: Dirty air in, clean air out. the 3-stage filtration system with dual-sided the HEPA filter of the 3-in-1 filter removes at least 99.97% of dust, pollen, and any airborne particles with a size of 0.3 microns (µm)

WHISPER-QUIET: Babies are easily woken up by noises and sleep deprivation can negatively impact their well-being. This air purifier keeps noise levels as low as 28dB and has a Sleep Mode, so you and your family can feel well-rested every night

Official Levoit Filters: Search for B08H8QNW1S or LV-H128-RF to find the Levoit Personal HEPA Replacement Filter. Levoit replacement filters provide the best fit and filtration, while off-brand filters are unreliable and may damage the air purifier
WHISPER-QUIET: Looking for stress relief after a high-pressure day. Add 2-3 drops of your favorite essential oils to the aroma pad and enjoy natural fragrance throughout your space

SMALL SIZE, POWERFUL DESIGN: Weighing only 3.3 pounds, you can take this air purifier anywhere. Enjoy completely refreshed air in just 30 minutes in 161 ft² spaces. It's perfect for living rooms, kitchens, offices, and bedrooms

ONE-BUTTON CONTROL: Forget about adjusting settings and knobs. One simple button controls the air purifier and lets you know when the filter needs to be checked. This air purifier is user-friendly, effective, and convenient

SAVE ENERGY, SAVE MONEY: We understand the importance of conserving energy. With a low rated power of 10W, you can run this air purifier 24/7 and pay as little as dollar 10 for the amount of electricity it uses in one entire year
body.description: Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 HzRated Power: 10WCoverage Area: 15 m / 161 ft Noise Level: 28-44dBDimension: 6.7 × 6.7 × 10.4 in / 17 × 17 × 26.5 cm NOTE :For an undisturbed night, this air purifier is designed to turn off the button light in 3-5 seconds when it is on sleep mode. The first fan speed level of the LV-H128 is the sleep mode, so the button light will be off quickly when customers tap the power button once. Additionally, the air purifier is too quiet on sleep mode.Different from other models of our air purifiers, the filter light of the LV-H128 can only be reset by pressing and holding the power button for 3-5 seconds when the machine is off (but make sure it's plugged in the socket).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exceeds Your Expectation: Enjoy Clean and Fragrant Air with LV-H128 Introducing the Levoit H128 Air Purifier, delivering fast, high-grade air filtration and purification to the air in your home!
Are you Troubled with Air Problems? Previous page Next page

Protect Against Pollution The first stage of filtration starts with the Pre-Filter, trapping dust, pet fur, hair, lint, and fibers. Get Filter Trap Allergens Remove cough and congestion-causing allergens from your space, such as pollen, fine dust, and pet dander, with the HEPA Filter. Get Filter Odors Removal Want to keep your home smelling fresh? The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, fumes, and unwanted kitchen and pet odors. Get Filter

Natural Aromatherapy Need a break from your busy day? Add essential oils to the aroma pad to infuse fragrance into your fresh air. Sleep & Work-Friendly The air purifier’s whisper-quiet operation keeps the fresh air coming while you sleep, work, or let your baby nap. One-Button Control Easily cycle through fan speeds with one button and view the indicator that glows red when it’s time to check the filter.

Previous page Living Room Play with your pets and chat with friends while the air purifier continuously refreshes your room. Kitchen Done cooking? The air purifier helps neutralize unwanted kitchen odors while you enjoy your meal. Office With continuous fresh air, you can create an ideal space to focus on work. Bedroom Fall asleep with the relaxing aroma of your favorite essential oil. Next page 1 Living Room 2 Kitchen 3 Office 4 Bedroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Win! Win! Win! Dust and dander from pets are managed. If you need to freshen your home's air quality--this is GREAT! Plus, it is not giant and you can adjust how loud it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air purifier to use in my bedroom, and I'm amazed at how well it's worked. After the first night, I noticed that my nose wasn't stuffed up in the morning, and I also had a better night's sleep. I love that I can diffuse my Lavender with it, which is really a bonus. It's absolutely quiet on the Sleep setting, and I really appreciate that there's no light on during the night. I've been using this every night for 6 months, have gently vacuumed the filters a couple of times, and hand washed the diffuser pad, and it still works great. I plan on ordering extra filters and pads, but so far haven't really needed to change them. Considering the price for this model, I'd say that overall, it has performed beyond my expectations, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quiet filtration, doesn't mitigate smells
reviews.reviewText: Pros: quiet, easy to use, dust filtration, better for small spacesCons: doesn't filter for smellsI bought this to use in room where we keep the cats' litterboxes. It's a small room. The filtration is better more dust & such than it is for filtering out smells. I use the oil pad which helps in covering smells but it doesn't eliminate altogether.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this item. I have two dogs and though we keep them clean and our home, there is no way to keep that dander away. Some days before a dog bath you can smell that dog smell, or when you're frying that after smell, those take awhile to disappear. As soon as this item arrived I plugged it in and it was amazing. Smells gone, dander reduced and best of all it doesn't take up much space. I've read other reviews about a plastic smell but follow directions and remove the plastic on the filter, that's the only step then done. It sucks the air and blows out the clean air so as a note sitting in front of it is like a fan, you'll feel the cold air. It works so well I bought for other rooms as well as for my mom and brother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to send back the first one that I bought because the button didn’t seem responsive and they sent me a new one and it works great so I bought a second one for my girlfriend in her office this silent mode is so quiet they can literally have it right next to a live Mike at a recording session and you can’t hear it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I put this in my smaller single-room basement where my cat litter box is, I hang dry my laundry, and I have my office, and there’s just no air flow. My basement no longer feels or smells dusty, and the litter box doesn’t even leave a lingering smell in the air the same way it used to even after I’d clean it.It took about a day for me to really notice it and it’s been super consistent since. It’s a great size, has a couple control setting levels, and looks great! Easy to setup & get going.I had something smelly in my kitchen that was lingering, brought this guy up to set in the kitchen, and it helped a TON. It’s a larger open space so it wasn’t perfect but it was very effective in filtering out whatever was in the air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Office use - Works Great!
reviews.reviewText: I think this does a great job of cleaning the air. My office is about 99sqft, so on the smaller side, so it definitely makes a difference. It’s pretty quiet, I’d say it’s a 8.5 / 10 on silence scale on the highest setting which is the only setting I use to blast away those germs! Low and sleep mode are basically silent 10/10. My office building is older and when I started working here i had stuffy nose and nose bleeds and sneezed all the time, now I don’t! Also, several people have gotten sick in my office building, colds and cv19, and I’ve been lucky enough to steer clear of all that! I do also wear a mask and wash my hands often when wondering outside of my office, but I keep my mask off on my air purified area ! I recommend it for small office spaces and imagine it would work great in bedrooms - I’m unable to speak for larger areas. Great buy for reasonable price! I haven’t used the infuser ontop because I have a separate air freshener, but I’m sure it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've never used an air filte. For the price, I assumed they were the most cost effective.They're not strong.Two in the same room does the trick, though.Just leave your doors closed and run them through the night, after about 8-12 hours, allergens are gone and so are lingering odors (being around smokers.The ambient wrrr sound is quiet enough not to interrupt TV, but it's a perfect sound to cancel noises at night when nothing is on.Again, it's not going to do much without both running unless it's a small room. But two does the trick.

Un excelente producto, en verdad no dudes en comprarlo.En primer lugar me pareció un buen precio, compré la versión que solo incluye los 2 filtros de base de triple capa. Ya en 6 meses mas compraré los repuestos.El Purificador es de tamaño ideal, ligero, con materiales de calidad, resistentes, de textutra y color agradables.Diseño sencillo de usar, simplemente lo volteas, sacas los filtros para quitarles la envoltura plástica, los vuelves a colocar, cierras, conectas, enciendes con un ligero toque y listo.MUY SILENCIOSO, no sé porque otros compradores se han quejado, yo lo puse en la velocidad alta y casi no se escucha, mucho menos en velocidad baja o en sleep; realmente funciona sin ruido.Inicialmente lo puse por 3 ó 4 intervalos de 25 minutos para no cansar tanto el motor de un solo golpey si, poco a poco fui sintiendo el cambio en el aire. Al principio producía un olor típico de plástico nuevo, pero horas después ya se fue disipando.Ya por la noche lo dejé en la velovidad baja por tiempos de 1 o 2 horas y si duerme uno mas cómodo, el aire se siente ligero, limpio, despierta uno con una sensación de descanso y una respiración mas completa y relajada.Lo único que lamento es no haberlo comprado desde hace 30 ó 40 años, porque cada día la ciudad donde vivo está mas y mas contaminada y ahora me doy cuenta de lo importante que es tener un Purificador de Aire.

reviews.reviewTitle: 2 semanas de uso y cumpliendo su propósito.
reviews.reviewText: Son fáciles de utilizar y no emiten prácticamente ningún sonido, la luz por la noche es imperceptible para mí y no causan ninguna malestar, los filtros relativamente sucios pero no exagerados teniendo en cuenta que son pequeños o para áreas no tan grandes, aún sigo notando polvo en los lugares que se limpiaron pero entiendo que esto no hace milagros, solo se que si funciona para recoger esas partículas aveces imperceptibles para nosotros y eso me tranquiliza un poco, los tengo encendidos prácticamente todo el día y sin falla alguna.Encontré filtros "económicos" y eso fue algo que llamo mi atención que la mayoría son algo costosos pero estos son accesibles :)Puede que compre su hermano core 200s pero los filtros son más costos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This a great little air purifier for a small room. Its simple and modern styling means it doesn’t stick out in your room and because of its small footprint, it doesn’t take up much space. It’s very quiet on “low” and barely noticeable when on sleep mode. The lights go off so it keeps the room dark and doesn’t disturb me even though I’m a light sleeper.The filters are easy to fit. Remove the bags and insert both filters, replace the lid and you’re set.The air definitely feels fresher with this in the room, and less dust collects on the surfaceThe only downside is that it defaults to “off” when turned on at the plug so using a timer plug won’t work with this machine. I tend to leave it on continuously instead as it only uses about 5w of power so it costs about 3p a day to run full time.These are a good enough price that I’m willing to buy a couple of more for my office and living room
Its a complete waste of money ….
Gillar den skarpt.Den är över förväntan, jag trodde den skulle låta betydligt mer med tanke på priset.Lätt att ta ut och dammsuga av filtret.
